spec.name: Val d'Anfa Garden
spec.description: Val d'Anfa Garden (Jardin du Val d'Anfa) is a public green space located in the exclusive Anfa neighborhood. This park serves as a tranquil, aesthetically pleasing urban amenity, featuring manicured lawns and pathways for relaxation and gentle recreation. It contributes to the high quality of life associated with the Val d'Anfa residential area.
